metadata.title: CVE-2022-3318 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in ChromeOS Notifications in Google Chrome on ChromeOS priorto 106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to rebootChrome OS to potentially exploit heap corruption via UI interaction.(Chromium security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
